title: Looking for our 4th roommate
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


A room is available in our loft, we are looking for our new roommate !

🏠The flat 🏠

It's a 170m2 lofts on three floors, with a big kitchen in the basement, a living room and two bedrooms in the ground floor, and two bedrooms upstairs.

The place has two bedrooms, a washing machine and a dishwasher. 

The neighbourhood's lively, with many shops, and bars and restaurants when they evetually open.

Lines 2 and 3 at a five minutes walk, lines 9 and 5 at ten minutes.

The available bedroom is on the ground floor, with a good space and high ceilings.It comes with a bed and a closet, you will be able to decorate the rest at your wish  🙂

We love animals, but one of us is allergic, so they may not be welcome.

👯 The roommates 👯

There are three of us following Seb's departure : Manon, Ferdinand et Alexandre. The three of us are active workers, with different rhythm, from remote working to night shifts. 

We all live in harmony, being a bit independent and quiet during the week, but often up to share a meal or an evening, inside and outside of our walls.  We also sometimes through rather nice parties.

We did not know each other before moving in together a few months ago. Kindness, inclusion and respect are the values we share, and we would love to keep going in that direction  🙂

📜Rent📜

- 800€ /mont + about 100€ of monthly charges (Cleaning, Internet, Electricity and Insurance)
-1600€ deposit
-"Bail solidaire" (solidarity lease ?)

Write us to introduce yourself, we'll organize visits soon !
